# ChangeLog

## 1.8.0
* Exposed PatronusClient class with async API

## 1.7.1
* Added force flag for trust-fabric instrument as this service call is critical, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4085

## 1.7.0
* Added Typescript support for patronus-client-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4063

## 1.6.1
* Fix: invalid path used in new API for patronus client, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3887

## 1.6.0
* Added lnp.json configuration, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3856

## 1.5.0
* added getPatronusKeyByIssuerAndSerialNumber, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188

## 1.4.0
* Added: authorization header with tf token, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188

## 1.3.0
* Added async PatronusClient from raptor.io, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188
* Added trust-fabric as authorization header via service-instrument-ebay/trust-fabric instrument

## 1.2.0
* Added isEnabled and deprecated isAppWhiteListed, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188

## 1.0.3
* Added cache for allowlist api

## v1.0.2

* Added: process.env.PATRONUS_SUCCESS_CODES to control if 404 or other status code should be considered an error or success
    The reason it is not added as configuration is because other module consumer of this module cannot override patronus config.
* Resolved: patronus-channel-key_404 should be a warning when fallback is enabled, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3096

## v1.0.0
* Initial Version
